resources.string: For educational use only, otherwise you bear all consequences!

"1. This software is designed for learning Android development and will not collect any user data. " "It is strictly prohibited to use this software to invade others' privacy or for gaming profit. If users cannot comply with this regulation, please delete it immediately. " "Users shall bear all adverse consequences caused by using this software that result in their own or others' privacy leaks, and the software author shall not be liable for any responsibility.
" "2. Users shall not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble this software product. Violators are committing infringement and shall bear the adverse consequences arising therefrom.
" "3. The software guarantees that it does not contain any viruses, trojans, or other malicious code that damages user data. However, since this software product can be downloaded and distributed through the network, the software author cannot guarantee whether the software downloaded from non-author-designated sites is infected with computer viruses or contains disguised Trojan horse programs or hacker software, and shall not be liable for direct and indirect damages caused thereby.
" "4. The software will be continuously updated to provide users with new features and fix bugs in the software promptly. The software author guarantees that the software does not contain any malicious code designed to damage user computer data during the upgrade process.
" "5. Due to the diversity and complexity of user computer software and hardware environments, the functions provided by this software cannot be guaranteed to execute normally or achieve the results expected by users in all cases. The software author shall not be liable for any consequences arising from users' use of this software.
" "6. If users install this software on their own, it means that users trust the software author, voluntarily choose to install this software, and accept all terms of this agreement. If users do not accept this agreement, please delete it immediately.
"
